page.title: 17Clubs & Events in Gringley
page.content: {"800 PLAYERS"}:begun year Church had its 800th Anniversary;one play:cast of 6 and a pantomime:cast of c.30 each year;venues - Church or open air; rehearsals - vicarage or Village Hall. {CRAFT SHOW (AUG).}:20-25 people demonstrate crafts ( weaving,spinning, woodwork,toy-making etc.) in Village Hall;4 cttee. members plan it all year round.{COUNTRY SHOW (SEPT.)}:begun in 1980;held in St.Peter's School Hall; raises approx. Â£100 for school funds; competitions for best fruit,veg.& flowers grown;childrens' competitions: "Longest Weed",LEGO/cardboard box models,flower arrangement in egg-cup, "garden"on a tray.{SPORTS DAY (JULY) :races for all ages 5-50yrs old;prizes of 75p,50p,25p;"Nutty" Race:cumbersome clothing (eg.wellington boots & overcoats)is put on in stages along length of course;Obstacle Race.
